title: "Machine learning helps scientists identify the environmental preferences of microbes"
excerpt: "A machine-learning approach can give scientists insight into the environmental preferences of microbes, based only on their genes. The approach has practical research implications: it could help researchers more efficiently grow bacteria in the laboratory."
